scripts.build: (npm install browserify && npm install saxophone && node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js lib/saxophone.js -o lib/dist/saxophone.js) && (npm install fast-xml-parser && node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js lib/fast-xml-parser.js -o lib/dist/fast-xml-parser.js) && (npm install ../jss/xmlflow && node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js lib/xmlflow.js -o lib/dist/xmlflow.js)
scripts.clean: echo -n > lib/dist/saxophone.js; echo -n > lib/dist/fast-xml-parser.js; echo -n > lib/dist/xmlflow.js
